author: marvin
msg: Allow undef to be supplied as a CFC object from Perl-space -- it will be
converted to NULL.  This puts the burden on the C code to perform NULL

msg: Nominate r1072084, and clarify my old comment on #3641.

author: angela
msg: JCR-2883 : Node.orderBefore and JackrabbitNode.rename should check for ability to modify children-collection on parent node

author: marvin
msg: Allow 'self' to be NULL for calls to CFCBase_incref() and CFCBase_decref().
